channel.title: Help with server status
channel.description:
Hello I've been messing around with the trisidiax server and im trying to get my version of it online but im new to the whole rsps thing. I'm not trying to advertise my server at all here I just need someone to try and get on it so i can see if its working, As soon as I figure out so I will remove this. Thanks
http://www.mediafire.com/?v86rfrd7e40c4m2

item.title: Help with server status
item.dc:creator: @kyler887 kyler887
item.description:
@kyler887 wrote:

yeah I’ve done all that, I just wanna make sure its all done right

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server status
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

If you’ve changed the IPs to the correct ones for players to get on and you have portforwarded, you shouldn’t have a question about people being able to get on. Since you’re hosting it on your computer, it’d be easier to just have 2 different client folders, one client for you, and the other for your players. Make sure the IP in the player’s client are your IP or no-ip, which ever one you use. For you to connect, just simply use 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic

Vexus_Client.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.
